review_body: So slow now it's getting to be unusable, takes 5-10 seconds at times between clicking a link, before it actually registers the click and does something. Reminds me of PCs in the 1990s. Typing is also a nightmare, it'll often lag and not show anything you've typed, only to suddenly all appear as if a...Full ReviewSo slow now it's getting to be unusable, takes 5-10 seconds at times between clicking a link, before it actually registers the click and does something. Reminds me of PCs in the 1990s. Typing is also a nightmare, it'll often lag and not show anything you've typed, only to suddenly all appear as if a ghost is in your phone. I use the Samsung browser now. Not perfect, but it's not broken like Chrome.

Chrome is the best browser on the market and I recommend it to everyone. However, the app lacks some simple yet crucial features desktop version has: - closing all tabs on exit (many accumulated tabs make mess and slow down the app's operating); - choosing custom downloads' location (files saved on SD card end up deep in folder hierarchy and get deleted when clearing Chrome data); - customizing new tab shortcuts; - extensions; - all PDFs get downloaded instead of being previewed in the browser.
